message.content:
Fetch the Gradle TOML version catalog and build files from this GitHub repository: https://github.com/siarhei-luskanau/spring-boot-sql-kotlin-sample

Specifically, retrieve and report the full content of:
1. `gradle/libs.versions.toml` — the version catalog file
2. The root `build.gradle.kts`
3. Any submodule `build.gradle.kts` files

Use WebFetch with the raw GitHub URLs:
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/siarhei-luskanau/spring-boot-sql-kotlin-sample/main/gradle/libs.versions.toml
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/siarhei-luskanau/spring-boot-sql-kotlin-sample/main/build.gradle.kts

Also check if there are submodule build files by fetching:
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/siarhei-luskanau/spring-boot-sql-kotlin-sample/main/settings.gradle.kts

Return the FULL raw content of each file. Do not summarize — show the actual text.

content.text: I'll fetch all four files simultaneously.

input.prompt: Return the full raw content of this file exactly as-is, no summarization.
Return the full raw content of this file exactly as-is, no summarization.
Return the full raw content of this file exactly as-is, no summarization.
